name: Spelling With Sandra
description:
Spelling With Sandra is an educational 2D platformer that takes place in a beautiful world full of wonders deep in the forest and under the sea. You are Sandra, a young girl who transforms into a mermaid upon entering the water. Help her find letters to words she has lost along her adventures. This early learning game encourages children in reading and spelling of common English nouns, verbs and adjectives.

Controls:
Press arrow keys or asdw to move.
Press space bar to jump.
Press esc for menu.
